item.title: About
item.description: My name is Kyle Herbertson, a current university student studying Mathematics and Computational Science. Inspired by the cool stuff my good friend Alfie Chadwick has been up to, I figured I may as well set up a place to share and explore the random stuff I find cool or useful. If this ever turns out to be any good and you want to get in touch/work on something together hit me up on LinkedIn or at kyleh898@gmail.
